reviews.text: Stayed with family including young children. very good experience. Nice garden, ample parking. rooms were typical size and maybe a little tired but clean and comfortable. had evening meal in the bar which was excellent as was the service. breakfast was freshly cooked and very good. again service was excellent. would recommend.
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.text: We have just returned from our honeymoon and would like to thank Michelle, Jo and all the staff for making our wedding day such a wonderful experience, From the perfect setting of the room for the ceremony, to the overall reception we were looked after fantastically. The food was excellent and plentiful and served with a smile. Everybody who attended enjoyed their day and are still talking about the wonderful time they had.
reviews.title: Our Wedding 25th May 2013

reviews.text: Cathy & Colin Curran

Damp bed , crap pillows and could not get a bit to eat or room service at 11pm , so I had to get out of bed , drive to a filling station and get something to eat , 49,00 euro room only , wouldn't return .
reviews.title: Service beyond a smile!

reviews.text: I drove round most of Southern Ireland and Northern Ireland following an unfortunate happenstance in Spain… my computer and all electronic information, plus loads of other stuff from within my car were stolen! All I had was my iPhone.
reviews.title: Basic food for a Sunday lunch....

reviews.text: the Ardboyne Hotel.
reviews.title: I'll be back

reviews.text: The food and service was excellent.
reviews.title: Nestling in Navan

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I choose the salmon option for my main course which was cooked perfectly and there was plenty of seconds available.
reviews.title: Spacious Room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I requested extra sauce which was delivered promptly.
reviews.title: Late arrival no problem!

reviews.text: Our group spent one night at the Ardboyne hotel in may, and we were very satisfied with all aspects of our stay.
reviews.title: Nice basic hotel where all works well

reviews.text: The staff at the reception was courteous and friendly, and did their job professionally. We had no "hickups" during our stay, as one could expect to be. The rooms were basic, but the hotel does offer good value for money. The restaurant was easily able to accomodate a larger group on a short notice, and we all received good meals and service.
reviews.title: Perfect Wedding Venue

reviews.text: The location is on the outskirts of Navan, and going to town does require some arrangements (not a short walk away). For an overnight stay, the hotel offers all needed amenities, and we were made to feel very welcome here.
reviews.title: Family day

reviews.text: My husband and I chose the Ardboyne Hotel for our wedding reception and it was the perfect venue. From the first day we met with Michelle she couldn't have done more for us. Our guests are still raving about the food, the room, the staff and the good deal it was to stay in the hotel including breakfast. I would recommend the hotel to anyone and my guests would also. Thanks again to the staff and especially Michelle for making our day so special!
reviews.title: Spring wedding

reviews.text: Myself and a friend brought our 4 little girls to the family day which took place bank holiday Monday! Bbq was in the garden, plenty of food to choose from for my fussy eaters and great entertainment to keep the children entertained! The girls loved gettin their face painted and having a dance to the live entertainment in the garden, lots of space in the garden for the girls to play in and very safe! Once u paid for ur food u were free to go and help yourself to as much food as you wanted! And an even bigger bonus lots of ice cream for the kids! Looking forward to the next family day :-)
reviews.title: Navan Newbie

reviews.text: I would like to thank Susan and all of the staff in the Ardboyne Hotel for the effort that they put into making the Confirmation Party such a success. There was over 450 people at the event and everyone that I spoke to had a great time .I look forward to going again next year when my other son is Confirmed. It was a very relaxed and well organised day. Thank you.
reviews.title: Cofirmation Day

reviews.text: we decided to go to your hotel last sunday 12th for your carvery lunch "us and apparently everyone else in Navan" the hotel was buzzing and your carvery very busy...we had to wait for just a little while for a table, however the reason im writing this review is to say how fantastic your staff were in looking after us your Chef was fantastic with a bright cheery outlook and did her best to make sure we had a table asap, the food was fantastic which explained the large crowd this was our first time with yous for lunch and without question wont be our last.
reviews.title: Day Out

reviews.text: Had a very pleasant stay here last night with my parents in two very clean, comfortable, well-appointed rooms. Staff in the restaurant were very friendly at breakfast and accommodated my parents who arrived late. Got a great deal too on their website which was excellent value for money. There is no lift in the hotel which was no problem for us but I would ask for a ground floor room if you're mobility impaired. I'd be happy to stay here again.
reviews.title: A good choice

reviews.text: We stayed in the Ardboyne Hotel in Navan, Co Meath, Ireland the week before and the week after our wedding in that hotel. Both the staff and the service were excellent at a very reasonable price. It is a very friendly, welcoming and 'feel good' hotel where the staff engage with you and are genuinely trying to make your stay really pleasant. We had our wedding at that hotel and the wedding coordinator Michelle Gilbane was extraordinary in both her knowledge, support and organisational skills. We had a fabulous wedding supported by all the hotel staff at an affordable price. We would highly recommend the Ardboyne Hotel for both weddings and hotel stay. The food, both the hotel daily food and the wedding food was excellent and there is always good quality and as much food as you would like. We cant say enough good things about this hotel except go there and experience it! Have your wedding there and you will see how helpful and great the Ardboyne hotel staff are to you and your guests.
reviews.title: Our Stay and Wedding at the Ardboyne Hotel, Navan, Ireland

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple

reviews.title: Fantastic wedding venue
